demoUpload.title: Manual import (demo)
demoUpload.description: Drop the provided (.demo) files here to prefill the questionnaire or load the product universe.

questionnaire.title: Client questionnaire (.xlsx)
questionnaire.hint: The sheet must use the same question IDs

products.title: Product universe (.xlsx)
products.hint: We count instruments and categories for the proposal

pdf.title: Client questionnaire (.pdf)
pdf.hint: We extract values formatted as id: value

messages.productsError: Unable to import the instrument file
messages.pdfEmpty: No useful values found in the PDF
messages.pdfError: Unable to import the questionnaire PDF

messages.fileRead: Unable to read the selected file
messages.uploaded: Certificate loaded. Verify the password to read metadata.

alert.locked: Enter the password to unlock the certificate.

metadata.empty: No certificate loaded. The file stays in memory only and will be used to sign the session PDFs.

modal.title: Verify certificate
modal.description: Enter the password associated with {{file}} to read the metadata.

questionnaire.title: Dynamic questionnaire
questionnaire.alert: Fill in all mandatory fields in the current section
questionnaire.info: You can import the questionnaire from Excel/PDF or fill it manually.

score.title: Risk profile
score.empty: Fill in the questionnaire to generate the risk profile.
score.exportTooltipIncomplete: Complete all mandatory answers before exporting the PDF
score.exportTooltipCertificate: Load and verify a P12 certificate to enable signing

messages.certificateMissing: Load the P12 certificate in the dedicated card.

modal.title: Report signing and hash
modal.description: Enter the password to sign the PDF with certificate {{file}}.

suggestedProducts.title: Suggested instruments
suggestedProducts.empty: Load the product universe and calculate the profile

productUniverse.title: Product universe
productUniverse.empty: Load the .xlsx file to inspect categories and counters.

messages.missingData: Complete the questionnaire before exporting the report.
messages.certificateMissing: Load and verify a P12 certificate to sign the PDF.
messages.unexpected: Unexpected error while generating the report

pdf.title: Profiling report - {{title}}
pdf.hashNotice: The digital signature and SHA-256 hash are applied at export time.
pdf.manifestNotice: Auxiliary files (.sha256.txt and .manifest.json) are saved next to the PDF for offline verification.

errors.health: Unable to contact the main process

Dinamico: Growth-oriented profile with high tolerance to volatility.
Significant exposure to dynamic and cyclical instruments is suitable.
Bilanciato: Balanced profile: willing to take moderate risks for mid-term growth.
Maintaining diversification between defensive and dynamic assets is key.
Prudente: Prudent profile: capital protection with modest growth.
Preference for low-volatility instruments and medium duration solutions.
Conservativo: Conservative profile: preserve capital with low loss tolerance.
Recommended: guaranteed lines, money market and short-term investment grade bonds.
